update purchase_order
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_quantity = #{orderQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE},

note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id}

update purchase_order set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_quantity = #{orderQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, pay_method = #{payMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_purchase = #{isPurchase,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
